mapper.insert:
insert into
(VERSION, FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_NAME, FUNCTION_TYPE, FUNCTION_PARENT_ID, FUNCTION_URL, ORDER_NO, FUNCTION_LOGO, BUTTON_POSITION, REMARK) values (0, #{functionId}, #{functionName}, #{functionType}, #{functionParentId}, #{functionUrl}, #{orderNo}, #{functionLogo}, #{buttonPosition}, #{remark})
mapper.select:
select * from
order by FUNCTION_ID, ORDER_NO

select * from
order by ID desc

select * from
where FUNCTION_TYPE < 3 order by FUNCTION_TYPE, ORDER_NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.* FROM a, b, c WHERE a.role_id = b.role_id AND b.function_id = c.function_id AND a.user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT e.* FROM e WHERE e.function_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.function_parent_id FROM a, b, c WHERE a.role_id = b.role_id AND c.function_type = 3 AND b.function_id = c.function_id AND a.user_id = #{userId}) UNION SELECT f.* FROM f WHERE f.FUNCTION_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT e.FUNCTION_PARENT_ID FROM e WHERE e.function_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.function_parent_id FROM a, b, c WHERE a.role_id = b.role_id AND c.function_type = 3 AND b.function_id = c.function_id AND a.user_id = #{userId}) )) ss where ss.function_type < 3

select d.button_position from d where d.button_position LIKE CONCAT(#{formName}, '%') AND d.button_position NOT IN (select c.button_position from sys_user_role a , sys_role_function b , sys_function c where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.function_id = c.function_id and a.user_id = #{userId} and c.button_position like CONCAT(#{formName}, '%'))

SELECT b.id FROM a, b WHERE a.function_id = b.function_id AND b.id = #{id} UNION SELECT c.id FROM c WHERE c.function_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT b.function_parent_id FROM a, b WHERE b.function_type = 3 AND a.function_id = b.function_id ) AND c.id =#{id} UNION SELECT d.id FROM d WHERE d.FUNCTION_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.FUNCTION_PARENT_ID FROM c WHERE c.function_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT b.function_parent_id FROM a, b WHERE b.function_type = 3 AND a.function_id = b.function_id)) AND d.id =#{id} ;
